Behavior weights (basic).name: alignmentBasic
Behavior weights (basic).label: Alignment Weight for Basic Boids
Behavior weights (basic).description: Velocity matching with neighbors. 0 - no alignment, 100 - full alignment

Behavior weights (basic).name: cohesionBasic
Behavior weights (basic).label: Cohesion Weight for Basic Boids
Behavior weights (basic).description: Attraction to neighbors' center of mass. 0 - no cohesion, 100 - full cohesion

Behavior weights (basic).name: separationBasic
Behavior weights (basic).label: Separation Weight for Basic Boids
Behavior weights (basic).description: Repulsion from neighbors. 0 - no separation, 100 - full separation

Behavior weights (basic).name: targetAttractionBasic
Behavior weights (basic).label: Target Attraction Weight for Basic Boids
Behavior weights (basic).description: Attraction weight to the local target for basic boids. 0 - no attraction, 100 - full attraction

Perception and neighbors.name: visionBasic
Perception and neighbors.label: Vision Radius of Basic Boids
Perception and neighbors.description: Perception radius for basic boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

Perception and neighbors.name: visionPredator
Perception and neighbors.label: Vision Radius of Predator Boids
Perception and neighbors.description: Perception radius for predator boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

Perception and neighbors.name: neighbourAccuracy
Perception and neighbors.label: Neighbor Accuracy
Perception and neighbors.description: Maximum percentage of neighbors considered when calculating boid behavior. 100 - all boids, 0 - no boids

Basic boid speeds.name: cruisingSpeedBasic
Basic boid speeds.label: Cruising Speed for Basic Boids
Basic boid speeds.description: Preferred cruising speed for basic boids in percentage of their maximum speed.

Basic boid speeds.name: maxSpeedBasic
Basic boid speeds.label: Max Speed for Basic Boids
Basic boid speeds.description: Maximum speed for basic boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

Predator boid speeds.name: cruisingSpeedPredator
Predator boid speeds.label: Cruising Speed for Predator Boids
Predator boid speeds.description: Preferred cruising speed for predator boids in percentage of their maximum speed.

Predator boid speeds.name: maxSpeedPredator
Predator boid speeds.label: Max Speed for Predator Boids
Predator boid speeds.description: Maximum speed for predator boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

Steering and dynamics.name: baseForce
Steering and dynamics.label: Max Force
Steering and dynamics.description: Maximum steering force applied to boids. 0 - no steering, 100 - maximum steering

Steering and dynamics.name: drag
Steering and dynamics.label: Drag
Steering and dynamics.description: Velocity damping factor. 0 - no drag, 100 - no movement

Predator stamina.name: predatorStaminaRecoveryRate
Predator stamina.label: Predator Stamina Recovery Rate
Predator stamina.description: Stamina recovery rate for predator boids.

Predator stamina.name: predatorStaminaDrainRate
Predator stamina.label: Predator Stamina Drain Rate
Predator stamina.description: Stamina drain rate for predator boids.

Interaction and avoidance.name: mouseInteractionMultiplier
Interaction and avoidance.label: Mouse Interaction Multiplier
Interaction and avoidance.description: Multiplier for forces applied by mouse interaction.

Collisions and bounds.name: bounceFactor
Collisions and bounds.label: Obstacle Bounce Factor
Collisions and bounds.description: Velocity reduction factor upon obstacle collision. 0 - full stop, 100 - no reduction
